hero.title: KC Bitcoiners
hero.description: We are a Bitcoin only group focused on fostering relationships and building community. We meet twice monthly throughout the Kansas City metro area.

topics.intro: Whether you're new to Bitcoin or a long time HODLer this group is for you. Meetups include discussions on topics such as:

meta.description: Join us for Bitcoin meetups, educational sessions, and community building in Kansas City

events.description: Join us for Bitcoin meetups, educational sessions, and community building in Kansas City. All skill levels welcome - from Bitcoin beginners to seasoned hodlers!

callToAction.title: Stay Connected
callToAction.description: Don't miss out on any Bitcoin discussions and networking opportunities. Join our Meetup group to get notified about new events and connect with fellow Bitcoin enthusiasts in Kansas City.

callToAction.title: Know a Bitcoin-Accepting Business?
callToAction.description: Help grow this decentralized vendor directory! If you know of a local business that accepts Bitcoin, submit their information to the Nostr network.
